description: Brock Rustin, an experienced handballer, has been looking for a young mentor like Sebastian Keys. Keys' first lesson involves one of Rustin's favorite toys, the anal beads. Rustin kicks back and opens his hole to receive the giant orbs, coaching Keys to take the handle in his mouth and tug. As soon as the beads pop out Keys puts on the rubber gloves; time for lesson two, fisting. Rustin realizes he's met his match as Keys slowly inserts his entire fist and twists his arm, masaging Rustin's guts like a pro. The lesson gets twisted when Keys stands over Rustin and puts his fist in his ass only to have Rustin reach up and fist his student's fresh hole. It's a double-fisting-frenzy that must be seen to be believed.
title: Take The Plunge
